overview: Matthew joined Peer39 from Tacoda, where he was SVP, Business Operations and one of the key executives responsible for the explosive growth of the company through its acquisition by AOL in 2007. Prior to Tacoda, Matthew had been with MTV Networks since 1989 serving last as Vice President of Online Ad Operations. He was also Vice President, Business Development and Operations for Nickelodeon Online from 1997 to 2001.

relationships.title: Chief Technology Officer and GM Israel, General Manager Israel
